name: Jessica L.
text: Nimsi is absolutely the best! My lashes have never looked so good. She's so professional and makes you feel completely comfortable. Highly recommend!

name: Maria G.
text: I'm obsessed with my hybrid set! Nimsi took the time to understand exactly what I wanted and the results are stunning. The studio is so clean and cute too.

name: Emily R.
text: The attention to detail is incredible. My lashes last so long and still look perfect weeks later. I won't go to anyone else.
